option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ListView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Spinner?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableColumn?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/cost_estimator.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.CostEstimatorController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox fx:id="navHeader" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="Doseln" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleCostEstimator" styleClass="nav-button-active" text="Cost Estimator"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calculator-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<!-- CENTER CONTENT --> <center> <VBox spacing="15" styleClass="main-content"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="20" right="20" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Header --> <VBox spacing="0" styleClass="header"> <padding> <Insets bottom="0" left="20" right="0" top="10" /> </padding> <Label styleClass="page-title" text="Cost Estimator" /> <Label styleClass="page-subtitle" text="Search for medicines and calculate total costs" /> </VBox>
<!-- Main Content Area --> <HBox maxWidth="570.0" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="444.0" prefWidth="570.0" spacing="15" styleClass="card" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <!-- Left Side - Medicine Search --> <VBox maxWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="414.0" prefWidth="279.0" spacing="10" styleClass="card-content" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <VBox maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="414.0" prefWidth="218.0" spacing="8" style="-fx-background-color: #C4E3D4" styleClass="content-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="15" left="15" right="15" top="15" /> </padding>
<Label styleClass="card-title" text="Search Medicines" />
<TextField fx:id="searchField" promptText="Search by Name" styleClass="search-field" />
<VBox spacing="5"> <Label styleClass="section-label" text="Available Medicines" /> <ListView fx:id="medicineListView" prefHeight="234.0" prefWidth="194.0" styleClass="medicine-list" /> </VBox>
<HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="32.0" prefWidth="178.0" spacing="8"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Qty:" /> <Spinner fx:id="quantitySpinner" prefWidth="60" styleClass="quantity-spinner" /> <Button fx:id="addToCartButton" onAction="#handleAddToCart" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="86.0" styleClass="add-button" text="Add to List" /> </HBox> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Right Side - Shopping Cart --> <VBox maxHeight="421.0" prefHeight="421.0" prefWidth="322.0" styleClass="shopping-card" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <VBox maxHeight="414.0" prefHeight="370.0" prefWidth="315.0" spacing="8" style="-fx-background-color: #C4E3D4" styleClass="content-card" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <padding> <Insets bottom="15" left="15" right="15" top="15" /> </padding>
<Label styleClass="card-title" text="Medicine List" />
<TableView fx:id="cartTableView" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" prefHeight="222.0" prefWidth="248.0" styleClass="cart-table" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <columns> <TableColumn fx:id="medicineNameColumn" prefWidth="120" text="Medicine" /> <TableColumn fx:id="quantityColumn" prefWidth="40" text="Qty" /> <TableColumn fx:id="priceColumn" prefWidth="70" text="Price" /> <TableColumn fx:id="totalColumn" prefWidth="70" text="Total" /> </columns> </TableView>
<HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT"> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> <Label fx:id="totalCostLabel" prefHeight="39.0" prefWidth="254.0" styleClass="total-label" text="Total: ৳0.00" /> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="100.0" prefWidth="185.0" spacing="10"> <Button fx:id="removeFromCartButton" onAction="#handleRemoveFromCart" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="80.0" styleClass="remove-button" text="Remove" /> <Button fx:id="clearCartButton" onAction="#handleClearCart" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="80.0" styleClass="clear-button" text="Clear" /> </HBox> </VBox> </VBox> </HBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ListView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Spinner?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableColumn?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TableView?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/cost_estimator.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.CostEstimatorController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox fx:id="navHeader" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="Doseln" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleCostEstimator" styleClass="nav-button-active" text="Cost Estimator"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calculator-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<!-- CENTER CONTENT --> <center> <VBox spacing="15" styleClass="main-content"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="20" right="20" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Header --> <VBox spacing="0" styleClass="header"> <padding> <Insets bottom="0" left="20" right="0" top="10" /> </padding> <Label styleClass="page-title" text="Cost Estimator" /> <Label styleClass="page-subtitle" text="Search for medicines and calculate total costs" /> </VBox>
<!-- Main Content Area --> <HBox maxWidth="570.0" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="444.0" prefWidth="570.0" spacing="15" styleClass="card" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <!-- Left Side - Medicine Search --> <VBox maxWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="414.0" prefWidth="279.0" spacing="10" styleClass="card-content" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <VBox maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="414.0" prefWidth="218.0" spacing="8" style="-fx-background-color: #C4E3D4" styleClass="content-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="15" left="15" right="15" top="15" /> </padding>
<Label styleClass="card-title" text="Search Medicines" />
<TextField fx:id="searchField" promptText="Search by Name" styleClass="search-field" />
<VBox spacing="5"> <Label styleClass="section-label" text="Available Medicines" /> <ListView fx:id="medicineListView" prefHeight="234.0" prefWidth="194.0" styleClass="medicine-list" /> </VBox>
<HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="32.0" prefWidth="178.0" spacing="8"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Qty:" /> <Spinner fx:id="quantitySpinner" prefWidth="60" styleClass="quantity-spinner" /> <Button fx:id="addToCartButton" onAction="#handleAddToCart" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="86.0" styleClass="add-button" text="Add to List" /> </HBox> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Right Side - Shopping Cart --> <VBox maxHeight="421.0" prefHeight="421.0" prefWidth="322.0" styleClass="shopping-card" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <VBox maxHeight="600.0" minHeight="380.0" prefHeight="440.0" prefWidth="315.0" spacing="8" style="-fx-background-color: #C4E3D4" styleClass="content-card" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <padding> <Insets bottom="15" left="15" right="15" top="15" /> </padding>
<Label styleClass="card-title" text="Medicine List" />
<TableView fx:id="cartTableView" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" prefHeight="222.0" prefWidth="248.0" styleClass="cart-table" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <columns> <TableColumn fx:id="medicineNameColumn" prefWidth="120" text="Medicine" /> <TableColumn fx:id="quantityColumn" prefWidth="40" text="Qty" /> <TableColumn fx:id="priceColumn" prefWidth="70" text="Price" /> <TableColumn fx:id="totalColumn" prefWidth="70" text="Total" /> </columns> </TableView>
<HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT"> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> <Label fx:id="totalCostLabel" prefHeight="39.0" prefWidth="254.0" styleClass="total-label" text="Total: ৳0.00" /> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="100.0" prefWidth="185.0" spacing="10"> <Button fx:id="removeFromCartButton" onAction="#handleRemoveFromCart" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="80.0" styleClass="remove-button" text="Remove" /> <Button fx:id="clearCartButton" onAction="#handleClearCart" prefHeight="30.0" prefWidth="80.0" styleClass="clear-button" text="Clear" /> </HBox> </VBox> </VBox> </HBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/doctor_info.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.DoctorInfoController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="DoseIn" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextArea?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/add_doctor.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.AddDoctorController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="DoseIn" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button onAction="#handleCostEstimator" styleClass="nav-item" text="Cost Estimator"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calculator-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<center> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="600.0" spacing="15" styleClass="doctor-root"> <!-- Doctor Information Card --> <VBox fx:id="doctorCard" alignment="TOP_LEFT" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="12" styleClass="doctor-info-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="18" left="30" right="30" top="18" /> </padding>
<!-- Title --> <Label styleClass="card-title" text="Add Doctor Information" />
<!-- Name Field --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Name :" /> <TextField fx:id="nameField" prefHeight="28.0" promptText="Enter doctor name" styleClass="doctor-field" /> </VBox>
<!-- Specialty Field --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Specialty :" /> <TextField fx:id="specialtyField" prefHeight="28.0" promptText="Enter doctor specialty" styleClass="doctor-field" /> </VBox>
<!-- Phone Field --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Phone :" /> <TextField fx:id="phoneField" prefHeight="28.0" promptText="Enter phone number" styleClass="doctor-field" /> </VBox>
<!-- Email Field --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Email :" /> <TextField fx:id="emailField" prefHeight="28.0" promptText="Enter email address" styleClass="doctor-field" /> </VBox>
<!-- Location Field --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Location :" /> <TextField fx:id="locationField" prefHeight="28.0" promptText="Enter location" styleClass="doctor-field" /> </VBox>
<!-- Additional Information Field --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Additional Information :" /> <TextArea fx:id="noteArea" prefHeight="80.0" promptText="Additional information goes here" styleClass="doctor-field" wrapText="true" /> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Bottom Action Buttons (Outside of card) --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="82.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="5.0" styleClass="action-buttons-container"> <Button onAction="#handleCancel" styleClass="cancel-button" text="Cancel" /> <Button onAction="#handleAddEntry" styleClass="add-doctor-button" text="Add Doctor" /> </HBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<center> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="600.0" spacing="15" styleClass="doctor-info-root"> <!-- Doctor Information Card --> <VBox fx:id="doctorInfoCard" alignment="TOP_LEFT" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="12" styleClass="doctor-info-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="18" left="30" right="30" top="18" /> </padding>
<!-- Title --> <Label styleClass="card-title" text="Doctor Information" />
<!-- Doctor Information Fields --> <VBox spacing="12" styleClass="info-fields-container"> <!-- Name --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Name :" /> <Label fx:id="nameLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Specialty --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Specialty :" /> <Label fx:id="specialtyLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Phone --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Phone :" /> <Label fx:id="phoneLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Email --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Email :" /> <Label fx:id="emailLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Location --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Location :" /> <Label fx:id="locationLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Additional Information --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Additional Information :" /> <Label fx:id="noteLabel" styleClass="info-value" wrapText="true" /> </VBox> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Bottom Action Buttons (Outside of card) --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="82.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="5.0" styleClass="action-buttons-container"> <Button onAction="#handleGoBack" styleClass="go-back-button" text="Go Back" /> <Button onAction="#handleDelete" styleClass="delete-button" text="Delete" /> </HBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<BorderPane fx:id="rootPane" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600" prefWidth="800" styleClass="dashboard-root" stylesheets="@../css/dashboard.css,@../css/doctor_info.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.momentum.dosein.controller.DoctorInfoController">
<!-- LEFT NAVIGATION --> <left> <VBox prefWidth="200" spacing="15" styleClass="nav-bar"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20" left="15" right="15" top="20" /> </padding>
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="70" spacing="12" styleClass="nav-header"> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="12" styleClass="logo-container"> <ImageView fitHeight="30" fitWidth="30" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/logo.png" /> </ImageView> <Label styleClass="nav-logo" text="DoseIn" /> </HBox> </HBox>
<!-- Navigation Menu --> <VBox spacing="8" styleClass="nav-menu-container"> <Button onAction="#handleDashboard" styleClass="nav-item" text="Dashboard"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/dashboard-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleManageSchedule" styleClass="nav-item-schedule" text="Manage Schedule"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calendar-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button onAction="#handleCostEstimator" styleClass="nav-item" text="Cost Estimator"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/calculator-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleDoctorContacts" styleClass="nav-item-contacts" text="Doctor Contacts"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/doctor-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleEmergency" styleClass="nav-item" text="Emergency"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/emergency-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button>
<Button onAction="#handleAboutUs" styleClass="nav-item" text="About Us"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/about-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox>
<Region VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS" />
<VBox styleClass="signout-container"> <Button onAction="#handleSignOut" styleClass="nav-signout" text="Sign Out"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="18" fitWidth="18" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@../images/signout-icon.png" /> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </VBox> </VBox> </left>
<center> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="600.0" spacing="15" styleClass="doctor-info-root"> <!-- Doctor Information Card --> <VBox fx:id="doctorInfoCard" alignment="TOP_LEFT" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="12" styleClass="doctor-info-card"> <padding> <Insets bottom="18" left="30" right="30" top="18" /> </padding>
<!-- Title --> <Label styleClass="card-title" text="Doctor Information" />
<!-- Doctor Information Fields --> <VBox spacing="12" styleClass="info-fields-container"> <!-- Name --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Name :" /> <Label fx:id="nameLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Specialty --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Specialty :" /> <Label fx:id="specialtyLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Phone --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Phone :" /> <Label fx:id="phoneLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Email --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Email :" /> <Label fx:id="emailLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Location --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Location :" /> <Label fx:id="locationLabel" styleClass="info-value" /> </VBox>
<!-- Additional Information --> <VBox spacing="3"> <Label styleClass="field-label" text="Additional Information :" /> <Label fx:id="noteLabel" styleClass="info-value" wrapText="true" /> </VBox> </VBox> </VBox>
<!-- Bottom Action Buttons (Outside of card) --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="82.0" prefWidth="520.0" spacing="5.0" styleClass="action-buttons-container"> <Button onAction="#handleGoBack" styleClass="go-back-button" text="Go Back" /> <Button onAction="#handleDelete" styleClass="delete-button" text="Delete" /> </HBox> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>
